headline.main: Bangladesh Stretch Lead as England Rue Missed Chances
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Stretch Lead as England Rue Missed Chances

docs.snippet: Bangladesh made England pay for wasted chances and extended their lead to 244 before lunch on the third day of the second and final test at the Shere Bangla National Stadium on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bangladesh made England pay for wasted chances and extended their lead to 244 before lunch on the third day of the second and final test at the Shere Bangla National Stadium on Sunday.

headline.main: Alaska's First Pot Shop Opens to a Long Line of Customers
headline.print_headline: Alaska's First Pot Shop Opens to a Long Line of Customers

docs.snippet: Alaska's first marijuana retail outlet opened to a throng of customers, two years after voters approved allowing people 21 and older to recreationally use pot....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alaska's first marijuana retail outlet opened to a throng of customers, two years after voters approved allowing people 21 and older to recreationally use pot.

headline.main: Clinton Enjoys Solid Lead in Early Voting: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.print_headline: Clinton Enjoys Solid Lead in Early Voting: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

docs.snippet: With 11 days to go before the U.S. presidential election, Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton leads Republican Donald Trump by 15 percentage points among early voters surveyed in the past two weeks, according to the Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nati...
docs.lead_paragraph: With 11 days to go before the U.S. presidential election, Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton leads Republican Donald Trump by 15 percentage points among early voters surveyed in the past two weeks, according to the Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nation project.

headline.main: Moldova Presidential Election Appears Headed to Runoff
headline.print_headline: Moldova Presidential Election Appears Headed to Runoff

docs.snippet: Moldova's presidential election appeared to be headed toward a runoff after a pro-Russia candidate's lead slipped to just under a majority Sunday, according to near-complete results....
docs.lead_paragraph: Moldova's presidential election appeared to be headed toward a runoff after a pro-Russia candidate's lead slipped to just under a majority Sunday, according to near-complete results.

headline.main: Cubs Cling to Slim Hopes of World Series Salvation
headline.print_headline: Cubs Cling to Slim Hopes of World Series Salvation

docs.snippet: Driven to the brink of a crushing World Series defeat on Saturday, the Chicago Cubs pledged to mount a backs-to-the-wall rally in Game Five to keep their slim hopes alive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Driven to the brink of a crushing World Series defeat on Saturday, the Chicago Cubs pledged to mount a backs-to-the-wall rally in Game Five to keep their slim hopes alive.

headline.main: Turkey Sacks 10,000 More Civil Servants, Shuts Media in Latest Crackdown
headline.print_headline: Turkey Sacks 10,000 More Civil Servants, Shuts Media in Latest Crackdown

docs.snippet: Turkey said it had dismissed a further 10,000 civil servants and closed 15 more media outlets over suspected links with terrorist organizations and U.S.-based cleric Fethullah Gulen, blamed by Ankara for orchestrating a failed coup in July....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey said it had dismissed a further 10,000 civil servants and closed 15 more media outlets over suspected links with terrorist organizations and U.S.-based cleric Fethullah Gulen, blamed by Ankara for orchestrating a failed coup in July.

headline.main: Iraqi Villagers Escape Islamic State Snipers, Leave Family Behind
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Villagers Escape Islamic State Snipers, Leave Family Behind

docs.snippet: After two years of ruthless Islamic State rule, Ahmed finally decided to make a run for it, past some of the group's snipers in his village in northern Iraq....
docs.lead_paragraph: After two years of ruthless Islamic State rule, Ahmed finally decided to make a run for it, past some of the group's snipers in his village in northern Iraq.

headline.main: Official: FBI Obtains Warrant to Search Newly Found Emails
headline.print_headline: Official: FBI Obtains Warrant to Search Newly Found Emails

docs.snippet: The FBI has obtained a warrant to begin reviewing newly discovered emails that may be relevant to the Hillary Clinton email server investigation, a law enforcement official told The Associated Press on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The FBI has obtained a warrant to begin reviewing newly discovered emails that may be relevant to the Hillary Clinton email server investigation, a law enforcement official told The Associated Press on Sunday.

headline.main: Clinton's Inner Circle Exposed in Final Stretch of Election
headline.print_headline: Clinton's Inner Circle Exposed in Final Stretch of Election

docs.snippet: As Hillary Clinton presses for a return to the White House, so, too, does the Clinton inner circle — the family of aides and confidants that have at times strained the loyalty, patience and political judgment of the figures at its center....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Hillary Clinton presses for a return to the White House, so, too, does the Clinton inner circle — the family of aides and confidants that have at times strained the loyalty, patience and political judgment of the figures at its center.

headline.main: Anthony Weiner Rocks Race for President With Sexting Scandal
headline.print_headline: Anthony Weiner Rocks Race for President With Sexting Scandal

docs.snippet: Once a hard-charging young congressman, Anthony Weiner lost his career and his marriage to a habit of trading sexually explicit messages that he couldn't shake — a lurid tale of personal self-destruction that's suddenly found its way into th...
docs.lead_paragraph: Once a hard-charging young congressman, Anthony Weiner lost his career and his marriage to a habit of trading sexually explicit messages that he couldn't shake — a lurid tale of personal self-destruction that's suddenly found its way into the race for president.
